body.body: Final Drive/Rear Hub and Bearings - Inspection - All Parts
Thoroughly clean all components and inspect for damage, wear etc. Renew as necessary.
Pay particular attention to the condition of the cush rubbers, examining for splits, damage, softness, etc.
Check the final drive bearing for wear or rough running, and the seal for damage.
Inspect the O-ring in the cush drive hub for damage.
Inspect the sprocket teeth for wear, damage and chips.
Check the wheel/hub bearings for damage, pitting, and cracks. Replace as necessary.
Check all bearing seals for damage, splits etc. Replace as necessary.
